summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing supplemental agreements with the Washington State Department of Transportation, King County and the Port of Seattle for the First Avenue South Bridge Over the Duwamish River project; authorizing the acceptance, and the deposit into the Engineering Department Operating Fund, of funds from the Washington State Department of Transportation; increasing an expenditure allowance and making a reimbursable appropriation for such purposes; and authorizing work and hiring expert and consultant services.
